Text:
I give up - how do you run this? 
AoE3 installed, installed this mod but how do you run it?

The campaign mode in Asian Dynasties does not work, and when I uninstalled your mod it screwed up the game! 
Thanks a lot, moron!

@2dyfor: Yes, the campaign is disabled because of the balancing changes. You run it by starting the normal game.

For further support visit http://ne.elpea.net, all your questions will be answered.

Please add the official NE tracker to your tracker list for this file: "http://ne.elpea.net/torrent/announce.php"

Thank you very much!
